about_the_game:
You can download DLC.
The game features DLC which allows you to have additional contents.



When you play this game, your palms get really sweaty.
Training the mind!Game is making yours feel horny!

Left-click on a block to remove it.
You lose if the mine appears.
The number will show how many mine are hidden in the surrounding eight blocks.
Right-click and mark the block you think is a mine.
Erase all blocks to win.
If you win you can see the girl naked.

how to play:
The rules of the game are the same as Minesweeper.
Avoid mine with hints of the numbers in the blocks around.
You lose if you open the mine.
Left click to destroy the block.
Right click to mark the block.

function:
Save achievements with the auto save function.
You can play from the beginning by resetting.
The game can be replayed any number of times.

Description:
Win the game to take off girls' swimwear.
A new stage and a new girl are waiting.
The stage gets harder.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: MINE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: An exciting game!Strip Puzzle Game! Break down clothes!
